Core: ['From the order, the distribution clerk registered an incoming order for an open order and an order to print.']
['With the order to print, the distribution clerk then instructs printing.']
['With the open order and ordered shirts, the distribution clerk packages the goods.']
['The packaged goods are then sent for the delivery and order-to-bill.']
['From the order to bill, an invoice delivery is instructed for the delivery details.']
